supermarket

Class Magasin

  • java.lang.Object
    • simj.SimResource
      • supermarket.Magasin

  • public class Magasin
extends SimResource
    This class implements the supermarket's shopping area resource.
    Author:
    Patrik Fuhrer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void afterEndService(SimEntity pEntity)
      Sends the client who just finished its shopping to the cash desk with the shorter waiting queue.

      Logs default information about the end of service of an entity by this resource.

      Logs default information about an entity requesting this resource.

      Logs default information each time an entity starts waiting in front of this resource.

      Returns how much time a client will spend in the shopping area.

      • displayInfoStartWaiting

        protected void displayInfoStartWaiting(SimEntity pEntity)
        Description copied from class: SimResource

      • getServiceTime

        protected double getServiceTime(SimEntity pEntity)
        Returns how much time a client will spend in the shopping area. Here, it is simply a random time between to bounds.
        Specified by:
        getServiceTime in class SimResource
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The client who will spend some time in the shopping area.
        Returns:
        The time the client will spend in the shopping area.
